name: "Black Is Beautiful" Baseball Jersey

logos.description: Rectangular woven-label-patch featuring 'BLACK ROSE COLLECTION', an MLB-style logo with an 'AUTHENTIC' banner, and smaller text including 'Members only...', 'Yay Area. Ca', 'Skyy Rose Collection', and 'Made for Kings and Queens'
logos.color: Yellow background, blue main text, black outlines, red and black MLB-style badge, white 'AUTHENTIC' banner

logoFingerprint.notes: The neck label and the lower front right patch are identical across both the black/white and black/orange jerseys. The 'BLACK IS BEAUTIFUL' text on both jerseys exhibits a smooth, flat finish with very crisp edges, which is characteristic of heat-transfer vinyl commonly used in sportswear for its clean appearance and durability on mesh fabrics. This distinguishes it from typical screen print that might show more fabric texture, or raised embroidery.

modelPose: Open jersey over fitted base layer, one hand gesturing outward, proud confident stance
setting: Dramatic urban skyline at golden hour, golden light casting warmth
